title: 110_hr6710
content: Oil for Iraq Liberation Act of 2008 - Prohibits: (1) the entry into or the performance by a US person or an entity owned or controlled by such person of a contract that includes overall management responsibility for petroleum development in Iraq, a contract for financing petroleum development in Iraq, or the guaranty of another person's performance under either such contract, (2) any investment by such person in Iraq's petroleum resources. And (3) any transaction by such person that evades or violates such prohibitions. Sets forth penalties for violation of such prohibitions. Defines specified terms.
